channel.title: Port-Forwarding
channel.description:
I am having trouble forwarding my port.
Can anyone help me?
-Nike Extra-

item.title: Port-Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @bleuboy08 bleuboy08
item.description:
@bleuboy08 wrote:

ok i ported foreward by typing in my ip or default gateway to find out go to control panel opening your network connections go to the one your connected to then go to support type the number into a internet bar example: http://127.0.0.1 then a page should pop up asking for your username and pass if ther not both admin then you probibly changed it and wrote it down type in that and then you should be at this page like lynxys or whatever motem you have then go to setup and ther should be a porting foreward option and you just fill out the thing and port foreward thats all i remember i might not be totally correct sorry

Read full topic
